original_body_lines: The Daily Mirror today captured the preparation activities for tomorrow's May Day rallies of the Janatha Vimukthi Peramuna (JVP), United National Party (UNP), Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP), and the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB). The JVP May Day rally will be held near the Viharamahadevi Park, the UNP will hold its May Day rally at the Sugathadasa Indoor Stadium, the SLPP at Campbell's Park Colombo and the SJB will hold its May Day rally at the A.E. Gunasinghe Stadium, Colombo Fort. Pix by Kushan Pathiraja
